key_features: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for user code review responses
Entity classes for managing reviews, review requirements, and user reactions
Repository interfaces for CRUD operations and custom queries
Support for pagination and complex queries
Unique constraints for user and submission relationships
Methods for updating review statuses and managing user interactions
project_hints: The project involves a review system where users can submit work for review.
User interactions with reviews are tracked, including likes and content updates.
Focus on managing review requirements based on user and submission identifiers.
Code review management system with user-specific review tracking and submission-based review matching.
